  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_302</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_302</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Medidas en una trama</string>
            <string language="en">Grid measurements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rasterfeldmessen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesures de grille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medidas da grade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misure di griglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετρήσεις πλέγματος</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones diferentes problemas geométricos de segmentos, cuadrados y triángulos sobre una trama de puntos en un plano.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve different geometrical problems on segments, squares and triangles on a pattern of dots on the plane.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trama</string>
            <string language="en">pattern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrado</string>
            <string language="en">square</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segmento</string>
            <string language="en">segment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, unterschiedliche geometrische Probleme auf Segmenten, 
Quadraten und Dreiecken auf einem Muster der Punkte auf der Fläche zu
lösen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre différents problèmes géométriques sur des
segments, des places et des triangles sur une configuration des points
sur l'avion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
problemas geométricos diferentes em segmentos, em quadrados e em 
triângulos em um teste padrão dos pontos no plano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere i problemi geometrici differenti sui segmenti, sui quadrato 
e sui triangoli su un modello dei puntini sull'aereo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τα διαφορετικά γεωμετρικά προβλήματα στα τμήματα 
μνήμης, τα τετράγωνα και τα τρίγωνα σε ένα πρότυπο των σημείων 
στο αεροπλάνο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muster</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
